name: The Tutors Network
description:
We support children's education with great people and great technology. 

Our mobile apps support open-source sharing of clients, tutors and tutoring roles. By allowing tutors to interact and recommend each other, we have introduced much needed self-regulation into the world of private tutoring. 

As a significant service offering, we fulfil the specific educational needs of young people by providing tutoring and mentoring to schools and local government across the UK.

team.title: Co-Founder, MD
team.name: Chris KJ
team.bioHtml: Founder @Ivy Russell Education, @The Tutors Network • Worked at @Morgan Stanley, @Hanover Investors

jobs.title: CMO
jobs.description:
You love education.

You understand UK education.

You know how to find more tutors to use our technology.

You know how to find more clients to use our technology.

You know that you could hit the ground running and make an immediate impact.

You want to work in a well funded, growing start-up.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
You love education.

You understand UK education.

You know how to find more tutors to use our technology.

You know how to find more clients to use our technology.

You know that you could hit the ground running and make an immediate impact.

You want to work in a well funded, growing start-up.

jobs.title: Business Development
jobs.description:
We're hiring people who care about education.

You'll be working within our Targeted Provisions team, where we provide needs-matching educational provisions for the most vulnerable children in the UK.

- Understands and wants to improve access to education
- Has worked in an operational role
- Strong excel skills
- Prefers teamwork to lone working
- Desire to work in a startup environment
- Has an ethical approach to business

Personality:

- You want to improve educational outcomes
- You think everyone deserves quality educational provision
- You understand that the needs of the most vulnerable children in society are not being met
- You don't want to work in a 'face-time' business
- You're bright, eager to learn and want to make a visible difference at work

Hard skills:

- Excel
- Quantitative
- Strong phone/email manner 
- Experience in Trello and Airtable would be an advantage
